hero.headline: YouTube Studio Tutorial: Master Your Dashboard

sections.content: YouTube Studio is your channel's command center. Understanding every feature helps you make data-driven decisions, manage your content efficiently, and grow faster. This tutorial covers the complete YouTube Studio dashboard from basics to advanced features.

faq.question: How do I access YouTube Studio?
faq.answer: Go to studio.youtube.com or click your profile picture on YouTube and select 'YouTube Studio'. Mobile app also available.

faq.question: What analytics matter most?
faq.answer: Watch time and average view duration indicate content quality. CTR measures packaging. Traffic sources show where to focus. All work together.

faq.question: Can I edit videos in YouTube Studio?
faq.answer: Basic editing only. Trim start/end, blur faces/content, add cards and end screens. For real editing, use dedicated software.

faq.question: How often should I check analytics?
faq.answer: Daily for active uploaders, weekly for most. Don't obsess over short-term fluctuations. Look for patterns over time.
